docs.lead_paragraph: Memorandum to marketing executives: if your company is planning a centennial celebration, start working on the event when the organization reaches the age of ninety-seven.

headline.main: Advertising: Centennial Is Years in Making; Equitable Started on Coming Event at the Age of 97
